Mirror Armor

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 205
armor id [armor]: 177 (Mirror Armor)
protection, body [protbody]: 13
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 1
magic resistance [mr]: +3

Requires 5A5W to forge (A1W1)

This armor has a large enchanted mirror on the chest that protects the wearer against hostile magic.
